title: Scrapbook, "Book of Folded and Woven Paper Designs", 1902–04
medium: Blue, white paper, various colored thread, stitched, pricked or mounted on brown wove paper, graphite, ink drawn notations; color lithograph; covered paperboard and brown ribbon (portfolio)
dimensions: Full sheet: 27 x 47 cm (10 5/8 x 18 1/2 in.)
description:
Folio accordion book of joined brown wove paper with a series of related blue and white geometric designs made from cut and mounted paper. Alternate pages have mounted white paper rectangles with stitches arranged in geometric patterns. One small color lithograph of a cherub mounted on one sheet.
Folio cover in three pieces [front, back and spine], cardboard with embossed brown linen on recto; maker's name embossed with gilding at center with additional embossed gilded ornament below. Brown ribbons attached at three sides of recto and verso covers.

tombstone.epitaph: Scrapbook, "Book of Folded and Woven Paper Designs", 1902–04.Blue, white paper, various colored thread, stitched, pricked or mounted on brown wove paper, graphite, ink drawn notations; color lithograph; covered paperboard and brown ribbon (portfolio). Gift of Marie-Luise Bensel. 1997-25-1-1/54.
